mapper.select: /* 권한구분 목록 조회*/ SELECT RGHT_CD , RGHT_CD_NM , RGHT_CD_EXPL , RGHT_CCD , APLC_F , RGST_DT , RGST_P_ENO , DLT_F , DLT_DT , DLT_TM , DLT_P_ENO , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA94B
/* 권한별 메뉴화면 사용권한 조회 */ SELECT rght_cd , rght_cd_nm , rght_cd_expl , rght_ccd , aplc_f , rgst_dt , rgst_p_eno , dlt_f , dlt_dt , dlt_tm , dlt_p_eno , hndl_dy_tm , hndl_dprt_cd , hndl_p_eno FROM RAA94B
